body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Raymond Wright and the customer's name is Carol Campbell.  The conversation is about Phat Hogs (a Motorcycle Dealership ) and is a conversation about typical situation.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is Raymond Wright and I am with Phat Hogs Motorcycle Dealership. It's great to meet you! May I ask for your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Carol! How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm actually feeling a bit overwhelmed with choosing the right motorcycle.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I completely understand, it can be a tough decision! Can I ask what type of riding you plan to do?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I mainly want it for pleasure rides and occasional long trips.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: That sounds exciting! For my records, could you please provide your email address?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's carol.campbell at example dot com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for that. And could you also provide your phone number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course! It's five five five, one two three, four five six seven.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Carol! I appreciate your time today, and I'm here to help you find the perfect motorcycle. If you have any more questions, please don't hesitate to ask.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thanks, Raymond! You've been really helpful.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome! Thank you for your time, and have a great day. Goodbye!
